attributes.action: Spend More on public transport NOT keep charging more for road users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government spent more making public transport better, safer, cheaper and more reliable instead of charging more and more for using the roads more people would leave their cars at home.
Sir Richard Branson has over 50 Pendolino trains costing around £11 million each. (£605 Million) and that's 1 person trying to make public transport better.
Where is the governments answer to the UK's Transport network??
Why Charge us more when we have nothing to show for the extra charges?
We pay Fuel tax, Road tax, Tolls (Bridges and congestion Etc.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
